sentences.sentence: His vulnerability makes him even more lovable.
sentences.translation: 他的弱点甚至使他显得更可爱。

sentences.sentence: One could mention many lovable traits in Smee.
sentences.translation: 斯迈身上可以列举出很多可爱的特质。

sentences.sentence: To tell poor Smee that they thought him lovable!
sentences.translation: 告诉可怜的斯密，他们认为他可爱！
